name: Nō
description:
You get to walk around a mysterious Japanese market. Exploring little shops would be fun, if there wasn't a feeling of constant presence of someone. As you try to find your way out, the narrow streets tell you their secrets...

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Interact

F - Flashlight

***This is a quickly-made prototype,  that demonstrates some aspects and ideas of our future game. 

If you want to support or contact us:

Telegram: https://t.me/hidingame
